title: How to contribute

## Contributing to this documentation

This is a quarto book hosted on github.

To contribute, head to the github repository and open either
an [issue](https://github.com/alxsimon/ecoevo.social-docs/issues),
a [pull-request](https://github.com/alxsimon/ecoevo.social-docs/pulls)
or a [discussion](https://github.com/alxsimon/ecoevo.social-docs/discussions).

Documents are written in markdown, and content are in the `./*.qmd` documents.

## Contributing financially to the hosting

Head to [Open Collective](https://opencollective.com/ecoevosocial).

## Helping moderating

If you want to help protect people from this instance against external and internal misbehaviors,
you can ask me to help moderating.

Send me direct message [@alxsim@ecoevo.social](https://ecoevo.social/@alxsim) and we can chat.
